title: Mobile Security
longDescription: Mobile devices often contain sensitive information and access to important accounts. These measures will help you protect your mobile security.

items.title: Screen lock
items.details: Use biometric authentication (fingerprint/face) and a strong PIN (at least 6 digits) or password.

items.title: App permissions
items.details: Regularly review and restrict unnecessary permissions for apps, particularly for location, camera, microphone, and contacts.

items.title: Biometric security
items.details: Enable fingerprint or face recognition for app authentication, especially for finance and crypto apps.

items.title: Remote wipe
items.details: Configure your device to allow remote wiping in case of loss or theft (Find My Device for Android, Find My for iOS).
